text: Aey eman walo! Tum mein say jo shaks apney deen say phir jaye to Allah Taalaa boht jald aisi qom ko laye ga jo Allah ki mehboob hogi aur woh bhi Allah say mohabbat rakhti hogi woh naram dil hongay musalmanon per aur sakht aur tez hongay kuffaar per Allah ki raah mein jihad keren gay aur kissi malamat kerney walay ki malamat ki perwah bhi na keren gay yeh hai Allah Taalaa ka fazal jissay chahaye dey Allah Taalaa bari wusat wala aur zabardast ilm wala hai
